prob_desc_description: You are given two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$. Print $$$a+b$$$.
prob_desc_input_spec: The first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases in the input. Then $$$t$$$ test cases follow. Each test case is given as a line of two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ ($$$-1000 \le a, b \le 1000$$$).
source_code:
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    print(a+b)
